title: 2024 Alaska Electricity Trends Report
description: Electricity capacity, generation, consumption, and price data from 2011-2019/21

resources.description: A dataset compiled from the time series built for Table 1.D of the Aug 08, 2023 Energy Statistics Workbook

fields.name: year
fields.description: Calendar year

fields.name: acep_region
fields.description: Alaska Center for Energy and Power Energy Region

fields.name: ff_turbines
fields.description: Capacity in megawatts (MW) using prime movers of types: combined cycle, gas turbines, and steam turbines

fields.name: ff_ice
fields.description: Capacity in megawatts (MW) by internal combustion engine prime movers

fields.name: hydro
fields.description: Capacity in megawatts (MW) by hydroelectric prime movers.

fields.name: solar
fields.description: Capacity in megawatts (MW) from utility-scale solarvoltaic panels.

fields.name: storage
fields.description: Capacity in megawatts (MW) from utility-scale battery storage.

fields.name: rooftop_solar
fields.description: Capacity in megawatts (MW) from rooftop (behind-the-meter) solarvoltaic panels.

fields.name: landfill_gas
fields.description: Capacity in megawatts (MW) from landfill gas generating units.

resources.description: A dataset compiled from the time series built for Table 1.D of the Aug 08, 2023 Energy Statistics Workbook. Long version data of working/capacity/capacity_wide.csv. Used for building the webpages and interactive plots.

fields.name: year
fields.description: Calendar year

fields.name: aea_region
fields.description: Alaska Energy Authority Energy Region

fields.name: acep_region
fields.description: Alaska Center for Energy and Power Energy Region

fields.name: prime_mover
fields.description: Powerhouse technology

fields.name: total_capacity
fields.description: Capacity in megawatts (MW) for the powerhouse technology

resources.description: A dataset compiled from Table 2.3b from the 2011-2021 Alaska Energy Statistics Workbooks deliverables.

fields.name: year
fields.description: Calendar year

fields.name: plant_name
fields.description: Reporting name for the power plant

fields.name: oil
fields.description: Net/Gross generation in MWh. Includes Distillate Fuel Oil, Jet Fuel, Residual Fuel Oil, and Waste/Other Oil

fields.name: gas
fields.description: Net/Gross generation in MWh. Includes natural gas

fields.name: coal
fields.description: Net/Gross generation in MWh. Includes Sub-bituminous Coal, Waste Coal, and Lignite

fields.name: hydro
fields.description: Net/Gross generation in MWh from Conventional Hydroelectric Turbines

fields.name: wind
fields.description: Net/Gross generation in MWh from wind

fields.name: solar
fields.description: Net/Gross generation in MWh from solar

fields.name: storage
fields.description: Net/Gross generation in MWh from battery cells.

fields.name: other
fields.description: Net/Gross generation in MWh from Agricultural By-Products, Wood Solids, and Other sources

fields.name: aea_region
fields.description: Alaska Energy Authority Energy Region

fields.name: source
fields.description: Data source

fields.name: data_version
fields.description: Verification status of the data

resources.description: A dataset compiled from Table 2.3b from the 2011-2021 Alaska Energy Statistics Workbooks deliverables. Long version of the data in data/generation/net_generation_wide.csv. Used for building the webpages and interactive plots.

fields.name: year
fields.description: Calendar year

fields.name: plant_name
fields.description: Reporting name for the power plant

fields.name: aea_region
fields.description: Alaska Energy Authority Energy Region

fields.name: source
fields.description: Data source

fields.name: data_version
fields.description: Verification status of the data

fields.name: fuel_type
fields.description: Primary fuel used at the power plant

fields.name: generation
fields.description: Total generation in MWh

fields.name: acep_region
fields.description: Alaska Center for Energy and Power Energy Region

resources.description: A dataset compiled from Table 2.5a of the 2011-2019 Alaska Energy Statistics Workbooks.

fields.name: year
fields.description: Calendar year

fields.name: aea_srid
fields.description: An unofficial unique identifier for all known entities that report sales to either PCE or EIA. Developed because EIA and PCE unique identifiers for sales were not compatible.

fields.name: pce_id
fields.description: Alaska Energy Authority (AEA) accounting code for PCE reporters, used as the unique identifier for PCE reporters.

fields.name: rca_cpcn
fields.description: Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity (CPCN) number issued by Regulatory Commission of Alaska

fields.name: utility_name
fields.description: Unofficial unique names for utilities and/or operators that include a combination of EIA utility/operator names, PCE utility names, and/or CPCN holder names, as appropriate

fields.name: reporting_name
fields.description: For PCE reporting entities, this variable is the name of a community (or a group of communities) that is separately reimbursed by the PCE program and is treated as a distinct utility entity by the Regulatory Commission of Alaska when determining allowable PCE reimbursements.

fields.name: intertie_name
fields.description: Unofficial unique identifiers for all known microgrids in Alaska—including ones that only include one community, plant, and/or sales reporter

fields.name: aea_region
fields.description: Regions defined by Alaska Energy Authority for regional energy planning

fields.name: residential_revenue
fields.description: Revenue from sales to residential customers, in thousands of dollars. For EIA data, this reported directly. For PCE data, the residential rate is reported and revenue is calculated as Residential Sales x Residential $/kWh

fields.name: residential_sales
fields.description: Sales to residential customers, in megawatt-hours (MWh)

fields.name: residential_customers
fields.description: The average of the 12 monthly close-of-month residential customer counts.

fields.name: residential_price
fields.description: Average revenue per kWh for residential customers. For EIA data, calculated as Residential Revenue $000 / Residential Sales MWh. For PCE data, equal to the reported residential rate.

fields.name: commercial_revenue
fields.description: Revenue from sales to residential customers, in thousands of dollars. For EIA data, this reported directly. For PCE data, the residential rate is utilized to estimate commercical revenue, calculated as Commercial Sales x Residential $/kWh

fields.name: commercial_sales
fields.description: Sales to commercial customers, in megawatt-hours (MWh)

fields.name: commercial_customers
fields.description: The average of the 12 monthly close-of-month commercial customer counts.

fields.name: commercial_price
fields.description: Average revenue per kWh for commercial customers, calculated as Commercial Revenue $000 / Commercial Sales MWh. For PCE data, Commercial $/kWh equals the residential rate, which is the reported data, and is used to calculate revenue.

fields.name: other_revenue
fields.description: Revenue from sales to other customers, in thousands of dollars. For EIA data, 'Other' equals the sum of reported 'Industrial' plus 'Transportation' categories. For PCE data, 'Other' equals the sum of reported 'Community Facilities' and 'Government' categories. For EIA data, Other revenues are reported directly. For PCE data, the residential rate is utilized to estimate other revenue, calculated as Other Sales x Residential $/kWh

fields.name: other_sales
fields.description: Sales to other customers, in megawatt-hours (MWh)

fields.name: other_customers
fields.description: The average of the 12 monthly close-of-month other customer counts.

fields.name: other_price
fields.description: Average revenue per kWh, calculated as Other Revenue $000 / Other Sales MWh. (For PCE data, Other $/kWh equals the residential rate, which is the reported data, and is used to calculate revenue.)

fields.name: total_revenue
fields.description: Total revenue from sales to all retail customers, in thousands of dollars.

fields.name: total_sales
fields.description: Total sales to retail customers, in megawatt-hours (MWh)

fields.name: total_customers
fields.description: The sum of Residential Customers plus Commercial Customers plus Other Customers

fields.name: total_price
fields.description: Average revenue per kWh sold, calculated as Total Revenue $000 / Total Sales MWh.

fields.name: data_source
fields.description: Source of the data

fields.name: acep_region
fields.description: Energy regions as defined by Alaska Center for Energy and Power: Coastal, Railbelt, Rural Remote

resources.description: A dataset compiled from Table 2.5a of the 2011-2019 Alaska Energy Statistics Workbooks. A long-form and condensed representation of 'capacity_wide.csv'. Used for plotting in Observable JS.

fields.name: year
fields.description: Calendar year

fields.name: aea_srid
fields.description: An unofficial unique identifier for all known entities that report sales to either PCE or EIA. Developed because EIA and PCE unique identifiers for sales were not compatible.

fields.name: pce_id
fields.description: Alaska Energy Authority (AEA) accounting code for PCE reporters, used as the unique identifier for PCE reporters.

fields.name: rca_cpcn
fields.description: Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity (CPCN) number issued by Regulatory Commission of Alaska

fields.name: utility_name
fields.description: Unofficial unique names for utilities and/or operators that include a combination of EIA utility/operator names, PCE utility names, and/or CPCN holder names, as appropriate

fields.name: reporting_name
fields.description: For PCE reporting entities, this variable is the name of a community (or a group of communities) that is separately reimbursed by the PCE program and is treated as a distinct utility entity by the Regulatory Commission of Alaska when determining allowable PCE reimbursements.

fields.name: intertie_name
fields.description: Unofficial unique identifiers for all known microgrids in Alaska—including ones that only include one community, plant, and/or sales reporter

fields.name: aea_region
fields.description: Regions defined by Alaska Energy Authority for regional energy planning

fields.name: data_source
fields.description: Source of the data

fields.name: acep_region
fields.description: Energy regions as defined by Alaska Center for Energy and Power: Coastal, Railbelt, Rural Remote

fields.name: class
fields.description: Retail customer class. Of Residential, Commerical, Other, or Total. For EIA data, 'Other' equals the sum of reported 'Industrial' plus 'Transportation' categories. For PCE data, 'Other' equals the sum of reported 'Community Facilities' and 'Government' categories. Total represents all customer classes.

fields.name: revenue
fields.description: Revenue from sales to the customer class in thousands of dollars. For EIA data, this is reported directly. For PCE data, the residential rate is reported and revenue is calculated as Residential Sales x Residential $/kWh

fields.name: sales
fields.description: Sales to the retail customer class, in megawatt-hours (MWh)

fields.name: customers
fields.description: The average of the 12 monthly close-of-month customer counts.

fields.name: price
fields.description: Average revenue per kWh for the customer class. Calculated as Revenue / sales (kWh). For PCE data, Commercial $/kWh equals the residential rate, which is the reported data, and is used to calculate revenue.

resources.description: A dataset compiled from Table 2.5 from the 2011-2021 Alaska Energy Statistics Workbooks deliverables.

fields.name: year
fields.description: Calendar year

fields.name: aea_sales_reporting_id
fields.description: Identification used for Alaska Energy Authority sales reporting

fields.name: pce_id
fields.description: Identification used for Power Cost Equalization reporting (pce_id = 0 if not part of PCE)

fields.name: rca_cpcn
fields.description: Identification used for Regulatory Commission of Alaska

fields.name: utility_name
fields.description: Name of utility company

fields.name: reporting_name
fields.description: Name reported by utility

fields.name: intertie_name
fields.description: Name of intertie

fields.name: aea_energy_region
fields.description: Energy regions as defined by Alaska Energy Authority, 11 in total

fields.name: acep_energy_region
fields.description: Energy regions as defined by Alaska Center for Energy and Power: Coastal, Railbelt, Rural Remote

fields.name: residential_price_kwh_2021_dollars
fields.description: Electrical rate of residential customers, expressed as cents per kilowatt hour, inflation-adjusted to 2021 dollars

fields.name: residential_customers
fields.description: Number of reported customers (not individuals) in the residential sector

fields.name: residential_sales_mwh
fields.description: Total megawatt hours sold to the residential sector

fields.name: commercial_price_kwh_2021_dollars
fields.description: Electrical rate of commercial customers, expressed as cents per kilowatt hour, inflation-adjusted to 2021 dollars

fields.name: commercial_customers
fields.description: Number of reported customers (not individuals) in the commercial sector

fields.name: commercial_sales_mwh
fields.description: Total megawatt hours sold to the commercial sector

fields.name: other_price_kwh_2021_dollars
fields.description: Electrical rate of other customers, expressed as cents per kilowatt hour. Inflation-adjusted to 2021 dollars.

fields.name: other_customers
fields.description: Number of reported customers (not individuals) in the other sector

fields.name: other_sales_mwh
fields.description: Total megawatt hours sold to the other sector

fields.name: total_customers
fields.description: Total number of reported customers (not individuals)

fields.name: ak_cpi
fields.description: Alaska Consumer Price Index used to calculate inflation-adjustment, CUUSA427SA0 from Bureau of Labor Statistics

resources.description: A dataset compiled from Table 2.5 from the 2011-2021 Alaska Energy Statistics Workbooks deliverables.

fields.name: year
fields.description: Calendar year

fields.name: acep_energy_region
fields.description: Energy regions as defined by Alaska Center for Energy and Power: Coastal, Railbelt, Rural Remote

fields.name: sector
fields.description: Customer class of reported price

fields.name: avg_price
fields.description: Calculated average price for the given combination (year, acep_energy_region, sector)

fields.name: weighted_price
fields.description: Population-weighted average price for the given combination (year, acep_energy_region, sector)
